ingredients.ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained, or more to taste
4 green onions, chopped, or to taste
½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste

cookingTips: Bake potatoes at 400°F for 45-50 minutes until tender
Mix tuna with mayonnaise and green onions to create filling
Top baked potatoes with tuna mixture and cheese, then broil briefly until melted
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These are simple baked potatoes topped with tuna salad and cheese. Guide the cook on proper potato baking and broiling safely for melted toppings.
